title: Workplace-Based Nursing Simulation Curriculum: Self-Directed Learning Model

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational clinical nursing skills and understanding of patient assessment protocols
context.additional_context: Configuring simulation learning environments using digital devices in hospital settings

learning_goals: Learners can perform simulation assessments based on real-world clinical scenarios with at least 80% accuracy.

Learners can accurately record four core indicators (blood pressure, body temperature, respiratory rate, pain level) in three or more practical sessions by applying patient health assessment protocols.
Learners can collaborate with peers/mentors via digital platforms to complete clinical judgment case studies within the first week.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
